sense.gloss: to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to buy
to be crowned with, to wear (on one's head), to have (on top)
to have (as one's leader), to live under (a ruler), to install (a president)
to get someone to do something
to be able to receive, to be able to take, to be able to accept
to be able to eat, to be able to drink
to be acceptable, to be satisfactory
x: 頂けない・いただけない

sense.gloss: top (e.g. of a mountain), summit, peak
top (of a profession, field, etc.), summit
peak (of popularity, a boom, etc.), height (e.g. of prosperity), apex, zenith, climax

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑頂上↑↓ちょうじょう↓まで↑登↑↓のぼ↓るのはむずかしい。
sdata.e: It is difficult for you to climb to the mountaintop.

sdata.j: お↑返事↑↓へんじ↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓けるのを↑楽↑↓たの↓しみにしております。
sdata.e: I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

sdata.j: ↑恐縮↑↓きょうしゅく↓ですが、９↑時↑↓じ↓にここへおいで↑頂↑↓いただ↓けますか。
sdata.e: Will you kindly come here at nine?

sdata.j: ↑丘↑↓おか↓の↑頂上↑↓ちょうじょう↓に↑着↑↓つ↓いた↑時↑↓とき↓、↑風↑↓かぜ↓はいっそう↑吹↑↓ふ↓きつのった。
sdata.e: The wind blew harder yet when we reached the top of the hill.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑山頂↑↓さんちょう↓に↑立↑↓た↓った。
sdata.e: We stood on the top of the mountain.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はついに↑富士↑↓ふじ↓↑山頂↑↓さんちょう↓に↑達↑↓たっ↓した。
sdata.e: We gained the top of Mt. Fuji at last.

sdata.j: あなたが↑一↑↓いち↓↑度↑↓ど↓↑約束↑↓やくそく↓した↑事↑↓こと↓は↑実行↑↓じっこう↓して↑頂↑↓いただ↓きたい。
sdata.e: We expect you to carry out what you have once promised.

sdata.j: ↑歌↑↓うた↓を↑歌↑↓うた↓いながら、↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑頂上↑↓ちょうじょう↓に↑登↑↓のぼ↓った。
sdata.e: As we were singing songs, we climbed to the top.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓か↑冷↑↓つめ↓たいものを↑頂↑↓いただ↓けませんか。
sdata.e: Would you give me something cold to drink?

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓か↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓を↑頂↑↓いただ↓けますか。
sdata.e: Can I have something to eat?

words.gloss: to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to buy
to be able to receive, to be able to take, to be able to accept
